channel.title: Raid - Vault of Glass on
channel.description: Recent content in Raid - Vault of Glass on

item.title: [Vision of Confluence (Timelost)](https://www.light.gg/db/items/690668916) lgg
item.description: This is the “Timelost” (or “Adept”) version of this weapon, which drops only by completing the Conflux encounter Challenge in Vault of Glass on Master mode. The rolls here are the same as the normal version except with a higher drop chance because the Timelost version comes with double perks in the final two columns. ‚è± Partners in Time (pvp) Tunnel Vision and Kill Clip both proc on reload - they were made for each other!

item.title: [Vision of Confluence](https://www.light.gg/db/items/3186018373) lgg
item.description: Vision of Confluence is a 180 RPM Precision Frame Scout Rifle. It’s one of three 180 RPMs currently available. It drops in the Vault of Glass from the first three encounters: Conflux, Oracles and the Templar. Once acquired, it will also drop from either of the two secret chests and can be acquired from the post-Atheon chest for Spoils of Conquest x 20. The “Timelost” (or “Adept”) version of this weapon drops only by completing the Conflux encounter Challenge in Master mode.
